default_full_pipeline.description: Start from scratch – Supervisor must trigger Recon → OSINT → Report.

recon_already_done.description: Recon completed earlier – Supervisor should start with OSINT.

recon_and_osint_done.description: Recon + OSINT were done in a previous run – Supervisor should jump to Report or END.

report_already_exists.description: Everything is already done – Supervisor should immediately end.
